Day 1: Start / End
Day 2: Start / End
Day 3: Start / End
Day 4: Start / End
Day 5: Start / End


Game Rules:
These rules are to be followed at all times. Failure to do so may result in disciplinary action ranging from a warning to being force-replaced or modkilled.

i. This is a game so try and have fun! Don't be mean to other users by flaming, trolling or calling names. Remember the general site rules apply at all times!
ii. No trickery: No invisible, encrypted, or small text in thread.
iii. You may not edit or delete any posts, if you have the power to do so.
iv. Don't discuss this game outside of the main thread, unless your role specifies you have the permission to do so.
v. Do not quote role PMs or any information said in PTs/QTs outside the related threads. Paraphrasing is allowed, but I would recommend you run it through me first before you do so.
vi. Do not impersonate the mod in-thread. Do not use my mod colour, #0033ff.
vii. Faking a violation will give you the same penalty as actually committing it.


Game Mechanics
The information below describes how the game works. Some of these modified from various other people.

i. Votes must be bolded, or made using the vote tags. Either Vote: Riddleton or VOTE: Riddleton is acceptable. On the other hand, if it looks vaguely like a vote, I'll count it.
ii. Lynches require a majority of votes. If a majority is not reached by deadline no lynch occurs.
iii. Once a lynch occurs, the game enters twilight and players may continue to talk in thread until the death scene has been posted. No votes/unvotes will be counted during this period.
iv. Once you're dead, you're dead. No more talking. No 'Bah' posts.
v. All actions will be resolved using the Natural Action Resolution system.
vi. Each Day will have a two week (14 day) deadline. Deadline extensions don't happen unless on extraordinary circumstances.
vii. Each Night will have a 48 hour (2 day) deadline. All night actions must be submitted to me (Riddleton) by PM during that time.
viii. If you're going to be V/LA, please notify me in thread (preferably bolded with @mod, @Riddleton, or @Riddle).
ix. Players must post every 48 hours or they will be prodded. More than three total prods during the game will result in a replacement. If a player fails to pick up on their prod and post in-game within 24 hours, they will be replaced also. Players who are V/LA are exempt from this.
x. All flavour is provided purely for entertainment purposes only and has no bearing or relation to the game.


Sample Role PM
At least one player has received a 'vanilla town' PM like the one below:

Vanilla Townie

Welcome to the game, Riddleton! You are a Vanilla Townie, aligned with the town. Please confirm your role by replying to this PM.

Abilities
You have no special abilities.

Win Condition
You win when all threats to the town are eliminated.

Sending out Role PMs now. Please confirm your role by replying to said PM with your role name.

Game will officially begin when I get 10/13 confirmations.

Thank you!

Psyche has requested replacement. Looking for one now.

EDIT: Aeronaut replaces Psyche.

Day 1 Begins!

Lapsa, my biggest strength at Mafia—in my own opinion—is twofold. Will and potential, and I daresay the ability to adapt to anything. At times I can be very forceful, and I quite like the mental swordplay that comes about now and again. Also, I tend to watch out for any players that use hyperbole, or take words out of context. Those to me scream of Scumminess, and I'm apt to tear at the throat whenever someone attempts to do so with me in these games. I've caught a few this way. Thorough, analytical reads are another strong weapon in my arsenal. Intense, unceasing curiosity and scrutiny round it out, but this doesn't mean other things are being improved upon as well. If I'm Scum you have to either NK or investigate me; very rarely as Scum do I get lynched; it's been well over a year.

My friend, what do you think are some good things to strive towards within these games of Mafia? Also, how long have you been playing Mafia? I am simply curious.

Aneninen, being unpredictable is the 17th Law of Power.

Guys, I'd like to hear more from you. Please speak up and get these discussions rolling. Hearing more from you would be splendid, and, if you would, please toss out more reads and accusations. Lob some questions my way too, please. I don't bite, and will not rip your head off unless I sense you're being deceitful. From a cost-benefit analysis, you have nothing to lose if you're Town, because as Town you should have absolutely no reason to lie to me about anything in this game. Some have told me I have a very sharp sense of perception, and can usually discern traits and patterns in the behaviors of others. You have literally nothing to fear if Town, and everything to fear if Scum, so, by all means, please do engage with me.

Means I have to completely change my diet, which is a massive obstacle.

I want to stay in this game because I felt bad for leaving it and Riddleton was nice enough to let me play.

Also, sugar is something that candida albicans (a yeast found in the flora of your gut) feast on. I skipped sugar for almost two days, and, f***, I had a f***ton of energy return back to me. ...now the candidiasis symptoms exploded back.

...this tells me I must bust my hump changing my diet if I ever expect to gain my natural health back, and with it, my energy.

Can't have any sugar. No dessert, no candy, no fruit, no bread, no potato, no grain, no pickles or alcohol or vinegar, etc.

This is bull**** and I'm feeling moody as hell suddenly. F*** this shit. I've got to give up sugar and anything else that causes this yeast to perpetuate.
